mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, r.id, r.comment_id, w.user_name as user_name, r.regi_date, r.reported_reason, a.admin_name as admin_name, r.processing_date, r.report_result from report r join wuser w on r.reported_by_user = w.id left join admin a on r.admin_id = a.id order by r.regi_date desc ) where rnum between 1 and 5
